website_summaries.verdict: More than just a one-trick pony, this option boasts a unique design that fulfills the role of a lounger, co-sleeper, and travel bassinet all in one.
pros: Cover has a different cute print on each side
Nest-like enclosure makes baby feel cozy
Lower price than many other choices
cons: Few complaints, although one or two buyers noticed a chemical smell upon receipt

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality lounger. My newborn sleeps comfortably in it. It is easy to handle. Machine washable. As a mother, I first look at the comfort of my child and for that it certainly exceed my expectation. This is not my first baby lounger. For my first child, I had purchased one which left me with great disappointment. I lost my money on that. So this time when I bought it, I was just praying for a good and comfortable. I must say it is certainly my good investment. It is thick enough and nice. Base is firm and soft. It is also easy for travel. Overall I love the quality and comfort of using this baby lounger
customer_reviews.author: Umasankar

customer_reviews.title: Breathable and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was very fast. I selected regular shipping, but I received it in 2 days! This product looks pretty nice. I really like the light blue/purple color. Hopefully my baby likes it, too! :P It is very soft and breathable. I used other baby nests before, and my kid got his back wet quite often. With this item, it doesn’t happen so far. I have not washed it, but it should be easy since it’s machine washable. It came with a handy bag as well. This is very convenient to carry it for travel.
customer_reviews.author: S Ikari

customer_reviews.title: Are you tired of waking up in the middle of the night?
customer_reviews.text: Do you have a baby that doesn’t not sleep well at night? Are you tired of waking up in the middle of the night? I was until I bought this baby nest. It simulates the baby still being in the womb. My daughter would not sleep all night until I got this. It is super soft and made of 100% organic cotton. The end closes or opens up for when your baby gets bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Iceman

customer_reviews.title: A necessity!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what we would do without this! A necessity for newborns. He loves it and sleeps so well in it! We can take this easily instead of a pack and play. The only down side is you can’t pull on the zipper too hard or else it’ll rip, as long as you are careful zipping it up you’ll be fine. Much better than spending $200 on a Doc a Tot
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Renee Pitcher

customer_reviews.title: Great Co-Sleeper Option
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Love that I can take it apart to wash. Soft and comfy. Me and my boyfriend use this as a co-sleeper for our son. Reminded me of the DockATot without the high price tag. We loved the deer pattern for our son since we did a woodland theme for his room.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Frushon

customer_reviews.title: Good substitute for Doc-a-tot!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and baby loves the shape! I couldn’t bring myself to pay $175 for a doc-a-tot, so I settled for this. Only thing is it’s kind of hard to get off to wash, and the bumpers are a bit lop-sided. More stuffing in one area then another. Other than that, I love this thing! Good for daytime naps and tummy time!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the over priced 100 and 200 dollar baby beds its still up there in price for the size and what you get but this is prolly the best option for price sturdy solid and easy to tear down to wash.
customer_reviews.author: ches

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THIS!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this! It is so high quality, was super easy to get put together, is super soft, super cute, a great size, lightweight, really durable, and just overall really really lovely. I plan on using this for my little one to sleep on the couch next to me while I work, take naps on top of our bed (alone of course), and bring to family's homes as a nice, small, portable travel sleeper. My toddler crawled in this to test it out for his upcoming brother and he would not get out. Cannot wait to use this!
customer_reviews.author: kt_hanamann

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Im happy i purchased this item! I had trouble getting my newborn to sleep in his bassinet. He would usually wake right after I put him down and would cry on and off for hours. I purchased this nest when he was 4 weeks old. It took him a couple of days to get used to it but once he did, he started going down with minimal problems. He’s 10 weeks old now and loves it! He sleeps soundly and doesn’t wake prematurely like he used to!!! I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KL Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Soft
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and very soft. Got this for my soon to be baby boy. So don’t know about baby comfort or him like it yet, but I love it! Easy to put together and will be easy to wash all parts. Zippers seem very sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It is larger than I expected, which is a good thing. The fabric is beautiful and soft. The stitching is well done. It is also very easy to set up. It is very beautifully made. The packaging is even good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Y

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is much cheaper and same results as a docatot. My son loves this. Easy to clean and travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Faina

customer_reviews.title: I finally found something my daughter will sleep.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter would only sleep with my holding her or right next to me in bed at night. I wanted her to be safer in bed so i did research on something i could put her in while she was still in my bed. I found out that the Dockatot had good reviews but ir was very expensive. This one seems to be working just as well with almost 1/3 or the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dock-a-tot who???
customer_reviews.text: My 1 month old refused to sleep in his bassinet, this lounger helped so much!! he is a little under 8 lbs and 20inches for reference. It makes him feel safe & cozy. you do not need to spend $175 on the dock-a-tot... this is just as good for less than half the price. The material is extremely well made and soft. the memory foam is the perfect amount of firm for a newborn. i like how the ties make the lounger adjustable. this will also help once we start putting him in his crib. i highly recommend getting this!!! 2 thumbs up for sure.
customer_reviews.author: BRC

customer_reviews.title: Fake advertising, NOT ORGANIC COTTON
customer_reviews.text: This lounger isn’t made from ORGANIC cotton. I’m not saying it’s a bad product, but why would lie about the item saying it’s organic when it isn’t? Fake advertising!
customer_reviews.author: Manon Salvi

customer_reviews.title: Skip the spendy dockatot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this instead of a dockatot after my newborn struggled in her bassinet. I thought these were kinda stupid -but baby loves it! I think because she can safely snuggle against the sides and feel still in the womb. Easy to put together, memory foam is firm but soft. I bring this thing all over my house! She naps on the couch in it, on my bed at night (for middle-of-the-night newborn breathing checks), fits inside my arms reach bassinet! I think I would throw it in my suitcase for travel too. Skip the spendy dockatot! This works great!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for newborn co-sleeping
customer_reviews.text: My newborn son sleeps so peacefully in this. It's not too bulky, fits in the middle of husband and I, we have a queen bed. I LOVE having my son right next to me at night. My son was 9lbs. 9oz., and he has some room to grow. Well worth the money, even if only get to use for 1 or 2 months. Bottom is soft enough to sleep on, but sturdy enough to prop up with pillow underneath so baby can sleep at an incline after feedings.
customer_reviews.author: SarahG

customer_reviews.title: So pretty, soft, and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! Very easy to put together. My only concern is the zipper that seals in the bumper seems like if your too rough with it you could break it. I will just make sure to be extra careful when removing to wash. I still would highly recommend! Worth the $60!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great seller!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had this item for 3 nights but it has made a drastic improvement in my son’s sleep! He is finally sleeping through the night at 6 months because of this product. We did dry it in the dryer which caused shrinkage, making the inner pad for very tight in the cover so don’t dry it! I did comment on the machine drying and the seller offered to send another product to make up for the issue. Great seller, great product. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% cotton
customer_reviews.text: This is not 100% cotton. Nowhere on the actual product does it list materials. I opened the package to a strong smell of synthetic foam, and at least the bottom pad is some know of foam (NOT cotton). Sending it back, and very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Haas

customer_reviews.title: One of the best investment made for my little one.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I invested in this baby nest. My baby sleeps soundly in this. We co-sleep and it’s great that he is sleeping with us on the bed, but we won’t have any issues of rolling on him. This also fits great inside the bassinet that we are currently using and he also sleeps well in there. Glad that I did not purchase the dockatot as I am sure this is very comparable to it costing about 1/4 of the price.
customer_reviews.author: MCY07

customer_reviews.title: Don't get me wrong...
customer_reviews.text: This IS a nice product. It didn't come with washing instructions... that bothered me. And I contacted the seller to ask if they would give me a slightly more competitive price since there are a couple others selling this item for much less... when I finally got a response, it was that they would not because their was a better product. So I got it. A friend got this from another seller for much less and it was the exact same. So while I'm happy with my product, I am a little upset with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of the product being like a knock off dock a tot. However the pad that the baby sleeps on comes folded in half and there was still a slight bump where the baby’s mid back would hit. So I decided not to put it into the lounger since she has a comfy mattress it lays on. Also the material is awful. It’s not soft at all. I got the floral pattern. It feels like Upholstery, I had to put a crib fitted sheet over it so it’d be soft. Maybe the other patterns have better material but I was very disappointed with mine. Pretty but not practical.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Vanderhoof

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a few design flaws
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. My son is almost 4 months old and sleeps every night in it for 10+ hours. I wish I could get a new cover for it as the cover is getting worn from washing so often. The zipper is absolutely awful and is breaking and ripping at the seams. Please let me know if I can get a replacement cover.
customer_reviews.author: MPont

customer_reviews.title: Fits in Bassinest and helps my baby sleep for longer stretches
customer_reviews.text: We bought this when our baby was 6 weeks old because he wouldn't let us put him down in the bassinet and insisted on sleeping in our arms or on the boppy all night every night. He would roll to his side right away in the spacious [for a newborn] open bassinet. It's so much better with this tucked inside of the bassinet. When it arrived, we also swaddled our baby using the SwaddleMe original. It was a winning combination. He doesn't roll to his side anymore and stays asleep for longer stretches. It seems to be of relatively good quality (we got the "lounger leaves" option) and I wish we'd gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: the Music Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, super soft, comfortable for my son
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to transition my son from bassinet to crib/ pack and play. Very happy with the quality of fabric and cushion. Material is soft (I did wash before using obviously) but it was soft to begin with. Packaged great and instructions were clear. My son is 3 months old, 25 inches long and 14lbs. He is a little long for the nest but he rarely sleeps completely stretched out and if needed, you can untie the bottom. The first night using this he actually slept through the bight for the first time and has been doing better all around since.
customer_reviews.author: Elora

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: My baby sleeps so comfortably and I feel she is secure in it. The sides prevent her to fall out when she moves or rolls. I normally have it inside her crib (she’s 2 months old now, I got it when she was a newborn), but I can take it to my bed, living room, or when visiting family/friends, knowing she’ll have her own space to sleep wherever I go. It’s light and has just the right dimension. Super easy to assemble and wash. This nest is definitely a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Gobbo

customer_reviews.title: Love for my little one
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bed. My son loves it. He sleeps in our bed and this is perfect. Great quality and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: super soft
customer_reviews.text: My husband talked me into ordering this instead of the dock-a-tot after he did some research and saw that this one had better safety ratings and customer reviews. We are super pleased with this and can't wait for our baby boy to get here to sleep in it! Our 3 year old daughter has snuggled up in it as well. It is reversible, so you can literally flip it over from side to side depending on which you like. With a memory foam center and minky sides, this thing is well made. 10/10 recommend. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Kasin Mann

customer_reviews.title: Registry MUST!!! Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: Of course I really wanted a dock-a-tot... But let's be real here, over $200 on a bed that the baby won't keep like you would a crib is absurd. I searched and searched for something similar with good reviews. This product didn't disappoint! The foam the baby sleeps on is sturdy and the surrounding pillow is soft enough. The cover is amazing quality as well. I am obsessed this little thing goes everywhere with me! Baby boy sleeps in it every night right now and seems comfy enough!!! A definite registry must!!!!
customer_reviews.author: T.Schuyler

customer_reviews.title: Over Expectation.
customer_reviews.text: Way over my Expectation, I love how a newborn can feel safe and warm becouse of the deep shape of this lounger. Very comfy, colors are soft. Another thing is, The packaging is so useful and can save allot of space later on when it’s no longer needed.
customer_reviews.author: Paz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This baby lounger is the perfect size for a newborn up to a few months... she is currently two months and she fits in there perfectly. However, I can tell that she will outgrow it in a month or two. I bought it because I noticed she wanted to be snuggled and this product does provide the snuggle she needs. Material is decent quality for the price. Love the product! P.S. I'm not the type to write reviews, but I really like this lounger.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Mota

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: This little lounger would’ve been perfect if it wasn’t for two things: washing it is a pain in the a**... the fabrics washes fine the problem is putting it back together. The zipper gets stuck and there’s no way to get the ribbon to the other end of the lounger so I can’t tight it closed which really sucks! I hate washing this thing because it really is such a problem getting everything fit back the same way like the first time. Even though it is more affordable than other loungers I would not recommend unless you don’t wash it. It’s sucks because my baby does like sleeping on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Watson

customer_reviews.title: I prefer it over DAT
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I’ve had a DAT for 3 years and this is honestly such a better value and option. It’s larger in length and width (although the side walls lay flatter so it’s not as tall). I love that I can flip it for a change in pattern easily. It’s very comfortable (memory foam like), easy to adjust and easy to put back together after a wash. I wish I had thought about this. Wouldn’t have saved me money and a few hassles.
customer_reviews.author: Cellie

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Buy this! We had our first baby and were interested in a dockatot, but not with a $200 price tag. Enter Mamibaby! A quick Amazon search found this baby lounger and we were sold. It’s a great quality and the cover is beautiful with the ties. We washed and dried the cover before using it and it was a little snug, but nothing unmanageable. My only complaint is we’d like to get another cover just to have a back up, but the replacement covers are over half the price of the lounger which seems a bit unreasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I contemplated about buying a Dock-a-tot or Snuggle me, but couldn't justify spending almost $200.00! This is just as good and so much more affordable. Its easy to unzip and take the foam out to wash the sheet part. I love this and have received many compliments on it! My daughter got a lot of use out of this. Will buy again for future kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: rsmithski

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!! Who needs Doc-a-tot?!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before my baby was born, thinking “Doc-a-tots” seem nice but we’re too expensive for the risk that my baby wouldn’t even like it. Turns out my 1mo old baby LOVES this — we use it every night. Ive been impressed by the quality, actually. We are able to move it in different rooms for night sleep/day naps but she still has a familiar sleep spot each time no matter the location. It even washes well. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: ReviewedByMom

customer_reviews.title: Portable bed of joy!
customer_reviews.text: This lounger is a god send!!! We have used this for my son since he was born! We can bring it to anywhere in our house, and he has a comfortable, safe space to lay in. The quality of the product is great & I feel like I can hand-me-down this product with no problem. I definitely recommend for anyone looking for a more portable option for your baby to lay in!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Barry

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, poor fitting
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I hate that something simple like this has to be made in China. Probably costed $5 to make it and selling for more than $60. Zipper is so weak, I don't know how long it will last. The padding barely fitted in, jammed in the sheet. I'm not sure how practical and good it will be. I guess we will see.
customer_reviews.author: mira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nap time on the couch!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for nap time on the couch. LO does not cosleep, but it’s perfect for her daytime naps. I’ll push the coffee table up next to the couch to prevent rolling out, and she’ll snooze the afternoon away. I never leave her unattended- I’ll walk away for less than a minute tops. My only complaint is that it’s kind of a pain to roll up for traveling. But I think that’s the nature of the beast.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A Gift from God
customer_reviews.text: Thank God for this little nest sleeper!! My baby literally only would sleep laying on my chest for the first 2 months of her life. I loved the idea of a dock a tot, but didn’t have the courage to sell a kidney for one. My baby not only sleeps on her back now, she sleeps for 6 hours at a time thanks to this product!! I recommend it to all my mom friends/family. It’s so easy to assemble and super comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Kearns

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and his girlfriend as a baby shower gift. She gave birth in August, and I have to say THEY LOVE IT! I looked at the reviews for the ahem... $300 type (doc a t..t). I looked in the store and looked at all the reviews and this one is softer, won’t ahem.. mold. They tell me that it is the most used item they got. My granddaughter loves it and whole-heartedly agrees. The color (I got the stars) is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad we found this just in time for youngest daughter, she's been sleeping in the nest since birth. She started sleeping through the night at 3 months old. I love that it's portable! We used it in her bassinet then transitioned it to her crib with no issues. Safe to say our baby loves it. It's easy to remove the cover to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer DelaCruz

customer_reviews.title: Really consider before purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: We had previously purchased this item and our twins loved it. However, washing it was quite difficult and to assure that it was always clean when we needed it we bought a second set. The second set was a complete disappointment. The edges were so understuffed that they would go flat and the twins would end up rolling out of it. I ended up stuffing the edges more myself and re-sewing it. That fixed the issue but it was a pain in the butt to do. Once the twins grow out of these we’re just going to purchase the real Dock A Tot in the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, every new parent should have one!
customer_reviews.text: We have a newborn and sleeping in a bassinet wasn't cutting it.. he is very fussy at night and wants to be near us. This is perfect and I love that I can use it in bed or on the couch. Overall great quality, we got the deer pattern and it's super soft and a cute. Should be easy to take out the foam and wash if needed.
customer_reviews.author: David Calfee

customer_reviews.title: NEWBORN LIFESAVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Our newborn just won’t stay in his crib. The first week home was the worst and we finally thought about a cosleeper! I wanted something soft and comfortable but safe enough where I knew we wouldn’t roll on him accidentally. THIS HAS SAVED MY SANITY!! My baby sleeps for hours through the night and after a consistent 4/5 hours of sleep straight, I can say this was well worth the money! I love how it’s similar to the doc a tot but way more economical!! Definitely a lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.author: kristine

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Did not want to pay that much for a doc a tot this worked great. They are pretty much the same thing. Put it in our halo bassinet and my son slept so much better! Love that it opens up at the bottom so it will grow with him. Took it to the inlaw when we travels was super convenient and washable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s fine but we have a larger one that is much better quality. The foam is a nice touch but it leaves a gap and my son was bound to stick his face in the gap and suffocate so I took the foam out. Problem is without the foam it sits weird. So we don’t use it at all. Maybe with the next newborn...
customer_reviews.author: Goldmama420

customer_reviews.title: Great for transition from co-sleeping to crib
customer_reviews.text: Love this as co-sleeper and used it to transition my little one to her crib at 3 months. Wished we had it sooner but we wanted to try bedside bassinet first. The firmness and fabric quality is great. Only took off for ribbon tie that comes out at wash and is a hassle to put back in.
customer_reviews.author: Wren

customer_reviews.title: Get one!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and soft. This is way better and safer than the Snuggle Me Organic! Baby actually sleeps longer in this. This item also fits the Halo Bassinet perfectly! Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Ka

customer_reviews.title: Hassle free set up
customer_reviews.text: This lounger fits the crib , bassinet and the rocker. My baby does not like to be swaddled and this lounger is snug. She usually wants to sleep while we are holding her but with this product, I can put her by my side and get some sleep while she is sleeping. Is high quality but has a chemical smell to it which will go within hours. The size is adjustable via string
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good product, didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: Does not help baby sleep like advertised, but I know that not all babies are the same so i’m applying a five star review because it serves its purpose. It’s soft, feels secure, easy to assemble, fits in her bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla  Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Great find, good price
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had found this with my first. Peanut sleeps so well in it and it fits perfectly in the halo bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Barone

customer_reviews.title: Best $$ ever spent on a baby item!
customer_reviews.text: This bed has been AMAZING for us. My daughter absolutely loves it and has been sleeping in it since she was two weeks old and will be four months old in two days. It started out in the middle of our king bed, moved to her bassinet, and is now in her crib. It’s also great for traveling and adds a sense of normalcy when in an unknown place which usually throws kids off. I have recommended this little bed to so many people and I wish I had bought this when I had my son in 2017! I absolutely recommend this to anyone looking for their baby to have some great sleep!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping Pal
customer_reviews.text: If your baby is not sleeping during the day or even at night, try this. It is totally safe, even for co-sleeping. She falls asleep in just a few minutes. The best design makes her feel safe and snuggled and we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Migdalia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sleeper! My baby sleeps in a bassinet next to the bed at night, but I needed a place to safely park him in our living room during the day. This thing is amazing! So comfy, firm, and so easy to transport room to room. My little guy lays in this sleeper on the couch while I get some work done. So worth the money! (Remember, this is for supervised sleep only!)
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love love this cute little dockatot my newborn refused to sleep in his bassinet and I would worry everytime he slept in the bed with us until we got this and for the past two weeks he has slept through the night with no problems and I love it best money will spent
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, cute, easy to assemble, wish was comfier on bed for baby to sleep
customer_reviews.text: This product is ideal for those who like to co-sleep/bed share. It does give you a sense of security for baby sleeping in bed with you. The design is adorable and my son does sleep it. However, I wish it was a little more comfortable on the inside bed where baby sleeps. I love that you can tie the bow or not to give back baby more room. Overall was happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Declercq

customer_reviews.title: Way better in person high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! The tubing and matress pad came vacuum sealed. The second you open it they fluff up. Super easy to assemble, love that it's all washable. Quality is amazing! I'm too cheap to buy a dock a tot but this exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Salvetti

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 2 months old and sleeps so good on it. Great for keeping her near me makes me feels safer would highly recommend. Very easy to clean and put together. Its super soft too and a very good size
customer_reviews.author: Bethany L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Product but not what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, soft and comfortable. Nice size. Unfortunately I returned it because I was looking for something to replace my boppy newborn lounger and this is flat, not elevated. We would try to elevate it on pillows so he could sit up more but it’s a long pillow and didn’t fit on the couch like the boppy pillow. Ultimately not what we were looking for but it’s a very nice product. I felt bad returning it. If you are looking for somewhere for your baby to nap/sleep it is very nice and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Tiscareno

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great, baby loves it and it’s great for traveling orjust hanging out! Much better price than a doc a tot and does the same thing. Our baby is picky about where he lays and he will actually relax and sleep in this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Co sleep
customer_reviews.text: My son doesnot sleep in the basinett, so I decided to purchase baby lounger which I can feel safe to Cosleep with him. Overall, it’s good and give me a peace of mind that he is having his own space. The mattress is not too soft which can be safe as well. The only thing I would not give 5 stars because it’s not too long. He is 3 months So expected him to use it for a next couple months or so
customer_reviews.author: nhi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cosleeper for when I nap with baby and this product fulfilled just that! It was so easy to assemble, quality is great, so soft, and makes me feel much better watching my baby as I rest without worry of baby moving. My newborn sleeps great in it. Price is great compared to competitors and does the job and is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: AJR

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so well made and really nice looking. I am so glad I went with this brand and design. We went with the moose design and it’s adorable in person!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing more than I thought I would. Bought it just for a co-sleeper, which it works great for, but I also use it as a changing pad, tummy time, and pillow. Only con is that my baby outgrew it quicker than I thought, too! But not the product's fault, of course...
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but string to tighten comes out easily
customer_reviews.text: My newborn sleeps so well in this. It took 2 days and he was sleeping better! I let me one year old try it out and he pulled one of the strings almost out and we can’t get it to thread back through (it’s the one that tightens the sides.) It’s super comfy and they both love it, just wish that wouldn’t have happened the 2nd day after we got it because it would be better to have the sides up. :(
customer_reviews.author: Erin C

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product but now not as much. I’ve washed it once on cold and dried on delicate and there are already tears in the seems. Also the zippers stick and hard to get closed. The material, size, and feel are all great just wish quality was better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My newborn fit just well in this lounger and will sleep fine aswell I love that it’s portable and I can take anywhere with me I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: kcm

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable for baby
customer_reviews.text: Who needs a dock a tot when you can buy a cheaper version that is just is good? Our baby loves this so much, she always looks so comfortable when sleeping it in. I do wish it were a little longer, but our baby will still get plenty of use out of it I’m sure. Our little one is 10 weeks, 12 pounds, and 23 inches and she fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: lacy

customer_reviews.title: Good Dockatot alternative
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. She slept good in side it. Washing was easy. Just be sure to tie the ends so your not fishing them out later. I did wash padding and all. Under gentle cycle with an extra rinse and spin. Quality is great. Good Dockatot duo. Update after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Smiletastic Day

customer_reviews.title: So amazing! Great Piece of mind!
customer_reviews.text: I had a preemie. I was scared to have her in crib away from me with her tepid breathing. But you hear horror stories of babies sleeping in bed with parents. This in between my husband and myself ha helped us both read a little and sleep better! Amazing buy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Hate the assembly
customer_reviews.text: I love this sleeper. It ensures me that my baby is safe. I gave it four stars due to assembly and having to take the entire cover off just to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The material is good. Used this since birth and so far good 5 weeks in. I'll be able to use this for a few more months. Washed the cover a few times now and no issues. Wish they sold additional covers but seems like not an option.
customer_reviews.author: BlackNWhite

customer_reviews.title: Came defective but was able to fix it myself.
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice. The only complaint is that it came with the end of the zipper not being sewn over before the end of the zipper so the zipper fell off one side and I had to seam rip some of it to get it back on and then sew it so it would come undone again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah W

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the cover it was rough and cheap fabric. The treading was coming off. Too expensive for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lounger! My baby hates being in her bassinet, but she loves this lounger. It's softer, easy to take around the house if you need to, and easy to wash. Plan on buying one for my sister when her baby gets here. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Toni Efimova

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Soft material. Easy to assemble. Came with instructions. Perfect size for bassinet or crib. Baby will be here next month to test for sleep quality. “ Two-day shipping”
customer_reviews.author: TAN

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing and so does my LO. She falls asleep on it as soon as I put her down. I flipped it to the gray side because that side feels like velvet. So incredibly soft! I wish I had this with my other 2. Amazing product at an amazing cost. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ViviD

customer_reviews.title: Good Nest fo babies
customer_reviews.text: If your baby already knows how to turn on his own I would keep my eye and not let him alone in it. Ive been using it a lot, sometimes i sleep right next to the nest. Im a light sleeper so I know I wont roll over it , if you are a heavy sleeper DONT do it. Good product overall
customer_reviews.author: Yuls

customer_reviews.title: First time mom; nightly sleeping problem solved!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mom, I had no idea that my baby would have a hard time sleeping in the basinet. She is almost 2 weeks old and would pretty much only sleep well on my chest or my husband's chest. She would wake immediately if placed in her basinet. Well, this changed everything! She finally slept in her basinet at night in 3 hour chunks! We placed rolled up towels on the outside of the baby nest so that she would be more snug since she is still so small. And it worked! I highly recommend this for anyone with the same struggles. It literally worked overnight for us and we finally got some uninterrupted sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Jahrell

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER!
customer_reviews.text: I kept putting off ordering the Doc-A-Tot because of the price. Finally got online to purchase and saw this for $100 cheaper. SOOO glad I bought it. Our baby sleeps in her crib in this and sleeps longer than she ever did before. It’s soft and easily assembled. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John Lamon

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this "nest" for our infant son after bringing him home from the hospital. The first few night were rough due to his refusal to sleep in the bassinet. We initially used it for the first couple of days co-sleeping until transitioning him in the nest into his bassinet. Happy with the product, he immediately took to sleeping in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I like this lounger, it’s cheaper than other brands out there and it does the same job. It’s also super soft. Although, my daughter is is growing pretty fast so might be to small for her pretty soon. Overall, she sleeps comfortable in this. great purchase and I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: IReviewIt

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Hell
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to take the cover off to wash. The zipper is flimsy and difficult to zip (gets stuck quite often). We ended up accidentally ripping the zipper pull off trying to unzip it. Do not recommend with as much as newborn gear needs to be washed.
customer_reviews.author: dubwoman

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product to help baby and Mommy sleep through the night.
customer_reviews.text: So wonderful! So happy I ordered this for my 6months old. Since he’s learned to turn over a couple of months ago he wakes himself up all through the mighty and doesn’t like his crib. He is so happy and slept better than ever the first night of having it. I’m so grateful for the nights sleep! Worth the money I spent. I washed it first and it held together fine. Easy to put together and my baby is so comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got this a week ago and my 7-week baby really likes it. It provides a safe and versatile place for baby to sleep in. We can move him from the bedroom to living room, use it for co-sleeping or in the crib. I haven’t washed it yet but hopefully it’s easy. I am happy about the purchase. But my baby is a bit on the long side so hopefully it will last a while for him.
customer_reviews.author: Koala la

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My 3 week old son was waking up as soon as I placed him in his bassinet, and I was getting desperate for a solution. Since I started using this product, he has slept for four hours chunks every night, only waking to feed and then happily settling back in. He doesn’t make a sound and is settled snugly in his little nest. I would highly recommend this to anyone dealing with the “only sleeps when I hold him” problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a life saver. Our baby (1.5 months old) will only go to sleep at night on either myself or dad. We put this sleeper in the bed with us and we can have baby sleep in bed with us at night without any issues. Doesn't take up a lot of bed space at all. My baby loves it. I wish I could put him in it and he would fall asleep on his own but its a work in progress. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This has changed my life! Love love loveeee my baby sleeps through the night! Game changer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleep longer
customer_reviews.text: My two month old hated sleeping on his back since day one. We put this in his bassinet and he's been sleeping for longer periods ever since! Definitely worth the money and less expensive than the well known brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Samide

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably for you tiny one
customer_reviews.text: Sort of like a dock a tot but at a much more affordable price. Very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Queen

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Useless Zipper
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if your baby never gets it dirty. Good luck trying to zip this thing back up! The zipper is SO tiny and hard to grad ahold of. It is a delicate balance between trying not to break it off and actually getting it zipped up. The larger string fell out after two washes. Frustrating enough that I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cori Lynne Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: More sleep!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves this and is sleeping longer for me now! He is 7wks old and I've been using for a little more than a week and have noticed the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Melecio

customer_reviews.title: Doc a tot who?
customer_reviews.text: Has been great! Soon as we got it, my husband put it together while I was feeding our little one. Helped us to transition him into his crib as well. And easy to put in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My daughter sleeps in her baby nest every night. It was a lifesaver! She prefers it over her halo bassinet which had a hefty price tag, I just wish I would of bought this first. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is the zipper is really tiny and you need to be careful trying to assemble after washing it. It seems if you tug it too hard it might break and is flimsy. I also wish it was a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver !!!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something my 4 week old would sleep in & this was a life saver!!! Washed it before use so it smelled like our other laundry & she took to it right away! Seems simple to clean should accidents occur. Love how it can tighten around her so she feels snug as if in my arms! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: It seems fantastic I can't wait for my little one to use it. My only complaint is that the cushions had a horrible strong smell to them. I did wash everything in Dreft baby detergent, but washed the cushions twice before the smell started to subside. I figured airing them out will kill the remaining odor.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ament

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok sleeper/lounger nest. In my opinion it is over priced. If I had it to do over again I would have spent a little extra and got the one I originally wanted. I would not pay over 40.00 for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kramazon

customer_reviews.title: Provides Great Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this insert. It helps her feel more confined and safe. Stop using when they can roll, because they will roll over he edge easily, but until then, this helped my daughter sleep well through the night. Easy to clean but a little harder to put back together.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Acker

product_meta.title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger, Baby Nest Stars 100% Soft Cotton and Breathable Portable Crib for Newborn Perfect for Co-Sleep
feature_bullets: 🌈100% Hypoallergenic Cotton Cover | Thick & Sturdy Bumper | 3d Soft Mat

🌈【Safe and Breathable Design】Adopting the American bionic concept to mimic the mother's warm womb, the baby co sleeper give the baby a full sense of security. This detachable bumper was designed with knitted surface fabric ,is more breathable and firm than ordinary non-woven fabric.

🌈【Double-Sided and Being Adjustable】The baby lounger cover has two sides pattern (One side is gray stars pattern and the other side is navy stars pattern) and you can switch between the two patterns in inside and outside, giving you and your baby a good mood every day.

🌈【Portable Travel Needs】The size of the baby nest is about 31.5 x 19.6 inches and weights only for 3.5lbs（1.6kg）.The lightweight design and convenient handles make our in bed bassinet a portable baby must-have .Package bag for easy transportation.It is an ideal travel needs for moms and babies .
🌈【Perfect for co-sleeping】360 degree protective cotton pad side guardrail design creates separate sleeping space for co-sleeping babies in the adult bed. Protecting your baby's sleep safety
🌈【Machine Washable】There is a hidden zipper on the bottom of the baby nest, which can be used to disassemble the cushion and the pp cotton in the fence for easy washing.

🌈【Best Service】Our team of professionals is constantly working to make you happier. We provide technical support for customers 24/7. We are confident in the quality of our product and 30 days no reason refund or 12 month service. Click “BUY IT NOW” and ENJOY QUALITY OF OUR NEW INFANT LOUNGER!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,031 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
